mapper.select: SELECT SUM(old_user) AS oldUserCnt, SUM(new_user) AS newUserCnt FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT DATE(create_time)) > 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS old_user, CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT DATE(create_time)) = 1 AND MAX(create_time) >= #{param.startDate} AND MAX(create_time) <= #{param.endDate} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS new_user FROM t_link_access_logs WHERE full_short_url = #{param.fullShortUrl} AND gid = #{param.gid} GROUP BY user ) AS user_counts;
